data.blankContent: Many people in today's job market are starting to work in the sharing economy. This ____ companies ____ Uber, but ____ many ____ in ____ different ____. For ____, ____ are ____ where ____ can ____ people ____ complete ____ tasks ____ you, or ____ you ____ your ____. These jobs provide a lot of flexibility, which is why people like them.
data.partBlankContent: Many people in today's job market are starting to work in the sharing economy. This incl____ companies li__ Uber, but al__ many oth___ in ma__ different ar___. For exa____, th___ are ap__ where y__ can fi__ people t_ complete sim___ tasks f__ you, or he__ you mo__ your furn_____. These jobs provide a lot of flexibility, which is why people like them.
data.answer: 如今的就业市场上，许多人开始在分享经济中工作。这包括像Uber这样的公司，还有许多不同领域的其他公司。例如，有一些应用程序可以让你找人帮你完成简单的任务，或者帮你搬家具。这些工作提供了很大的灵活性，这就是人们喜欢它们的原因。
